title: Adjust Brightness
aboutDescription: Adjust the brightness of your images to correct exposure, enhance visibility, or create specific moods. Fine-tune light levels for perfect results.

sections.title: When to Adjust Brightness
content: Mood creation: Adjust for dramatic or cheerful effects

sections.title: Tips for Best Results
content: Make small adjustments to preserve image quality
Combine with contrast adjustment for better results
Check histogram to avoid clipping highlights or shadows
Adjust brightness before applying other filters
Preview on different devices to ensure consistency
